Play:
Masakiyo's Loyalty
(Hachijin shugo no honjō / 八陣守護城)

Written By: Nakamura Gyogan (中村漁岸) , Sagawa Tōta (佐川藤太)

First Staged: 1807

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 168, September 1979; Bunraku September 1979 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

October 1979: Masakiyo's Loyalty

September 1979: Masakiyo's Loyalty

July 1992: Masakiyo's Loyalty

Characters:

Masakiyo Kato (Katō Hidanokami Masakiyo / 加藤肥多守正清)

Yoshinari Mori (Mori Sanzaemon Yoshinari / 森三左衛門義成)

Hayase, a maid (Koshimoto Hayase / 腰元早瀬)

Saeda, a maid (Koshimoto Saeda (Sae) / 腰元左枝)

Hinaginu (Musume Hinaginu / 娘雛絹)

Gemba Marikawa (Marikawa Genba / 鞠川玄蕃)

Shigarami (Tsuma Shigarami / 妻柵)

Kazuenosuke Kato (Kato Kazuenosuke Kiyosato / 加藤主計之介清郷)

Tokimasa Hojo (Hōjō Tokimasa / 北条時政)

Imperial messenger (Yamakage Chūnagon / 山蔭中納言)

Kyuma Hayabuchi (Hayabuchi Kyūma / 早淵久馬)

Spy (Shinobi / 忍び)

Teruha, a maid (Koshimoto Teruha / 腰元照葉)

Miyuki, a maid (Koshimoto Miyuki / 腰元深雪)

Yoshihiro Ouchi (Ōuchinokanja Yoshihiro / 大内冠者義弘)

Hazue (Okugata Hazue / 奥方葉末)

Nadaemon, in fact Motobei Kojima (Sendō Nadaemon jitsuwa Kojima Motobei Masatsugu / 船頭灘右衛門実は児嶋元兵衛政次)
